Why to choose a VPS hosting plan offered by QHoster.com:

- Instant VPS activation (do not need to wait)

- Highly secured and well maintained servers
- cPanel, Plesk and other control panels including security setup during provisioning

FAQ:

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, AlertPay (Payza), Skrill (MoneyBookers), Yandex money, WebMoney, CashU, Liberty Reserve, WU/MG and 80 more different payment methods

Q: What is your average setup time?
A: All VPSes are setup instantly so you do not need to wait

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2004

Q: Do you allow adult content?
A: Yes, we allow legal adult content on our servers in UK and USA (Germany is not Adult friendly)

Q: Do you allow VPN & proxies on your server?
A: Yes, you we allow VPN & private proxies on our servers

Q: Can we setup VPN with our VPS server?
A: Yes all servers have OpenVPN and PPTP support

Q: Do you offer Reverse-DNS (RDNS)?
A: Yes we can modify the RDNS for your IP address/es, just email support
